## releaseObject() function

Releases a disposable object

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function releaseObject(obj: IDisposable): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

obj


</td><td>

[IDisposable](doc/markdown/./base.idisposable.md)


</td><td>

Object to release


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Releases an object will decrease the reference counter for this object. If reference counter become zero, the object will be disposed at next frame.
